label: A2B2C3D10E2_oC76_37_d_d_cd_5d_d-001
title: Bi$_{2}$Sr$_{2}$Ca$_{2}$Cu$_{3}$O$_{10+x}$ (Bi-2223) Structure
comments:
(Shamray, 2009) found some disorder in this crystal: the Bi (8d) site has 6\% vacancies, the Cu (8d) site is actually 90\% copper and 9\% bismuth, and the Sr (8d) site has 3\% vacancies.  It is not clear where the extra oxygens needed to control the superconducting behavior are added to the crystal. 
 (Shamray, 2009) give the structure in the $A2aa$ setting of space group \#37.  We used FINDSYM to transform this to the standard $Ccc2$ setting. 
 Space group $Ccc2$ \#37 does not fix the origin of the $z$-coordinate.  We do this by setting $z_{1} = 0$ for the Cu (4c) site.
